version_description:
- Create Your Own Flyer From Scratch
- Added grid lines for better alignments in editor
- Auto save your designed cards

Added new features such as multiple layers for stickers, change the color of stickers, handle for zoom and alignments.
Bug Fixes
Performance Improvements

- New Feature: Duplicate Sticker / Text
- Improved: Sticker & Text Touch / Selection
- Improved: Performace of the editor

Please rate the app and give your feedback to help us improve and create much more unique apps for you. Happy Designing...

* NEW - Background color selection screen added
* NEW - Export template size selection added
* NEW - Font Style: Underline, Uppercase, Lowercase, Titlecase added
* IMPROVED - Performance of editor
* RESOLVED - UI issue of landscape editor in iPhone XS Max
* Minor bug fixes

Please rate the app and give your feedback to help us improve and create much more unique apps for you. Happy Designing...

1. Bug Fixes & Performance Improvements

• New - Search option in Backgrounds, Graphics, Shapes and Text Arts
- Now You can search Backgrounds, Graphics, Shapes and Text Arts for a particular category.

• New: Fonts screen added in the app.

• New Feature Added: Crop Image in Shape.

• Performance improved.

• Dark Mode for iOS 13!
- We have added support for dark mode using system settings under iOS 13.
- Turn it on under Settings -> Display & Brightness -> Dark Mode.

Also, Important Bug Fixes!!

• Brand new tools added to create the best product ads.
